                                        Mayor

                                        Email Mayor Davis

                                        Welcome to Crowley!

                                        We are a vibrant growing community just minutes south of Fort Worth. You will encounter the warmth and hometown impression our city has to offer.

                                        Video Tour

                                        Goal

                                        As leaders, our goal is to continually improve city services, attract new businesses and provide a quality of life to accommodate visitors and the residents of this community. We thank our residents for their support toward the progress of this city.

                                        Mayor Billy P. Davis

                                        Bio

                                        Mayor Davis has lived in Crowley for more than 30 years, and prior to serving as mayor for the last 22 years, he served on the City Council for four years.

                                        He is the owner of J. Davis Tree Care Services Inc., and is a Texas Certified Arborist.

                                        Billy Davis Mayor 817-297-2201 ext 4000 Email
